entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
